ns9:component-version-script.script:
echo Creating start.bat in "%WAMPDIR%" echo @echo off > "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat" echo cd "%wampdir%" >> "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat" echo start /min .\wampmanager.exe >> "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat"
echo Creating wampmanager task schtasks /create /tn wampmanager /sc daily /ru system /tr "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat" /f schtasks /run /tn wampmanager rem schtasks /delete /tn wampmanager /f
echo ERRORLEVEL is %ERRORLEVEL% exit /b 0

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

ns9:component-version-script.script: echo Agent Install Dir: %AGENTDIR% echo running as %USERDOMAIN%\%USERNAME% if exist "%AGENTDIR%\svservice.exe" call "%AGENTDIR%\svservice.exe" attach %VOLUME% echo ERRORLEVEL is %ERRORLEVEL%

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

ns9:component-version-script.script:
:waitagain if not exist "%WAMPDIR%" ( echo Waiting for %WAMPDIR% directory ping -n 2 127.0.0.1 >NUL goto :waitagain )
exit /b 0

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2
